mapper.select: select sg.SG001,sg.SG008 from st4_sys_sg sg left join st4_po_sa_sg sasg on sasg.SG001= sg.SG001 WHERE sg.SG007=1 and sasg.SA001=#{sa001}
select SG001,SG008 from st4_sys_sg where SG007=1

update st4_sys_sg
SG002 = #{sg002,jdbcType=INTEGER},
